question: 181. Which of the following is a caching engine?
182. Which of the following are caching engines used by ElastiCache? (Choose two.)
183. Which of the following can you use reserved instances with?
184. For which of the following can you use reserved instances?
185. In which situations will an RDS instance with Multi-AZ configured fail over? (Choose two.)
options: C. When the secondary zone is unreachable
A. When you manually force a failover
D. When two successive database reads fail
B. When the primary zone is unreachable
answers: A. When you manually force a failover
B. When the primary zone is unreachable

question: 186. Which of the following can you select when you create an RDS instance? (Choose two.)
options: B. The number of network connections to allow before failing over
A. The type of database to use
D. The availability zone to deploy the instance to
C. The number of database processes to allow
answers: A. The type of database to use
D. The availability zone to deploy the instance to

question: 187. Which of the following may happen when you have a single-AZ RDS database and a backup begins? (Choose two.)
options: B. Database responses may temporarily slow.
D. Network requests will fail for up to a minute.
C. The database goes offline temporarily.
answers: B. Database responses may temporarily slow.

question: 188. Which of the following database engines are available for RDS? (Choose two.)
189. Which of the following is true about RDS? (Choose two.)
options: D. All RDS databases support SQL as an interface.
B. Automated backups are turned off by default.
A. Reserved instances can be used for Multi-AZ deployments.
C. Every database supported by RDS can also be installed directly on EC2 instances.
answers: A. Reserved instances can be used for Multi-AZ deployments.
D. All RDS databases support SQL as an interface.
